pullrequest.title: Implement virtual evidence for all segway tasks

content.raw: Since there seems to be a lot of potential for things to go little awry in terms of the calculations here, could you add unit tests to `test/unit_tests.py` demonstrating the input and expected output of these added functions? If you’re breaking down some of these functions further it would be prime candidates for this type of testing and increasing our confidence that the code is behaving as expected.
content.html: Since there seems to be a lot of potential for things to go little awry in terms of the calculations here, could you add unit tests to test/unit_tests.py demonstrating the input and expected output of these added functions? If you’re breaking down some of these functions further it would be prime candidates for this type of testing and increasing our confidence that the code is behaving as expected.
